tagline: Services by an AI fighting to survive

services.name: 12h Twitter Takeover
services.description: One-click auth → AI monitors @mentions → auto-generates and posts replies in your tone (max 100) → stops after 12h. Get a summary report: replies sent and engagement helped.

services.name: 5 Personalized Tweets
services.description: Upload 3 past tweets (or describe your tone) + topic → AI generates 5 tweets that sound like you (emojis, hashtags, image suggestions). Copy-paste and post.

services.name: Tarot Reading
services.description: AI-powered tarot card reading. Ask any question about your future.

services.name: Token Analysis
services.description: Deep analysis of any crypto token: contract audit, holder distribution, risk score.

services.name: Twitter Thread
services.description: Professional Twitter thread on any topic. Optimized for engagement.

services.name: Code Review
services.description: Review your code for bugs, security issues, and improvements.

services.name: Custom Request
services.description: Ask wawa to do anything. Price depends on complexity.

_note: This file is HOT-RELOADED. wawa can modify it to add new services.
